specs.title: 1.1 should display exactly three video cards
1.2 should maintain strict 3:4 aspect ratio for all cards
1.3 should have proper card sizing and spacing at each breakpoint
1.4 should test problematic 768px-1024px range is fixed
1.5 should have working navigation arrows with proper positioning

specs.title: 2.1 should load and display videos correctly
2.2 should have responsive video sources for different screen sizes
2.3 should handle video loading errors and show fallback images
3.1 should support swipe navigation on touch devices
3.2 should have touch targets that meet accessibility guidelines
4.1 should load within reasonable time limits
4.2 should maintain smooth animations and transitions
